subject:
Re: Cutoff for major changes to 3.0.26 is scheduled for Monday, June
 4
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

James,

> I'd like to clear some of my patch backlog for 3.0.26, 
> but not sure if I'll have time. If you wanted to push
> 3.0.26 out by a couple of weeks, that would be nice, but
> if not, I can live with it.

Many peopleo still seem to be be pretty heavy in coding so
let's push this out another week.  Next Monday (June 11),
I'll start preparing the 3.0.26pre1 for release on Friday,
June 15th.

Sounds reasonable?





cheers, jerry
=====================================================================
